scripts.clean: bundle exec jekyll clean && bundle clean
scripts.build: webpack --mode=production && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.postbuild: npm run create-track-archives && npm run link-tracks && npm run clean-images
scripts.create-track-archives: find assets/tracks/ -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d -exec sh -c "find {}/ -name '*lowres.gpx' -printf '%f\0' | tar -czf _site/{}/lowres.tar.gz -C {}/ --null --files-from -" \; && rm -f _site/assets/tracks/*/*lowres.gpx
scripts.update: npm update --save && npm outdated && gem update bundler && bundler update && echo to update node, manually run: nvm install node and remember to update github workflow
